abstract.text: A structure that represents a range of time.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: This document describes the API for creating and manipulating
as a non-opaque, mutable structure by using two
values that specify the start time and duration of the range. A time range doesn’t include the end time because you calculate it by adding the duration to the start time.

code: // An expression that evaluates to false.

inlineContent.text: to use in annotations and various Core Foundation containers.
that represents a duration must be
, and the value must be nonnegative. The epoch in a
that represents a timestamp can be nonzero, but functions (such as
) can only perform operations on ranges whose start fields have the same epoch.
